snippet: The Treasury Department announced on Friday that it would sell more of its stake in A.I.G., an offering that comes after a recent surge in the insurer's common stock.
abstract: The Treasury Department announced on Friday that it would sell more of its stake in A.I.G., an offering that comes after a recent surge in the insurer's common stock.

headline.main: Treasury to Sell More Shares in A.I.G. as Stock Recovers
headline.print_headline: Treasury to Sell More Shares In A.I.G. as Stock Recovers
